string-array.name: new_in_version_changes
string-array.item: - Added Multiplayer Example\n - Added TouchDragMany Example

- Line Example now with random line width
 - Added Zoom Example
 - Added SpriteRemove Example
 - Added Sprites Benchmark
- Benchmark results now can be submitted by mail

- Removed SpritesExample
 - New animation in AnimatedSpritesExample
 - Added PhysicsJump Example
 - Added SpriteBenchmark
 - Added AnimationBenchmark
- Made Benchmarks harder (so near-future devices do not already cap at 60 FPS)
- Added possible performance fix for the Droid/Milestone
- Added ParticleSystemCool Example\n - Added ParticleSystemNexus Example\n - Added ParticleSystem Benchmark
- Added ImageFormat Example (PNG, JPG, GIF, BMP)
- Benchmarks now get submitted to a Server instead of mail to me.
